text:
The #COVID19 Dashboard has been updated: https://t.co/XhspoyTG79

On Wed 31 March, 4,052 new cases and 43 deaths within 28 days of a positive test were reported across the UK.

30,905,538 people have received the 1st dose of a #vaccine, and 4,108,536 have received a 2nd dose. https://t.co/ipT1NXcLsd
